summary: A transfer student attempts to take over the most violent high school in the country, whose students form factions and battle each other for power.
cast: Shun Oguri|Kyôsuke Yabe|Meisa Kuroki|Takayuki Yamada|Sansei Shiomi|Ken'ichi Endô|Gorô Kishitani|Bob Buchholz|Shunsuke Daitô|Mari Devon|Peter Doyle|Kaname Endô|Doug Erholtz|Erina|Motoki Fukami|Grant George|Hisato Izaki|Yûsuke Izaki|Taliesin Jaffe|Yusuke Kamiji|Kenta Kiritani|Yû Koyanagi|Steve Kramer|Camille LaBry West|Yuri Lowenthal|Dave Mallow|Yutaka Matsushige|Ryûsuke Nakamura|Kazuki Namioka|Bryce Papenbrook|Sam Riegel|Ayumu Saitô|Patrick Seitz|Michael Sorich|Doug Stone|Tsutomu Takahashi|Sôsuke Takaoka|Suzunosuke Tanaka|Hiroshi Watanabe|Ezra Weisz|Dan Woren
title: Crows Zero
